TopicTitle: What is the Mod that has the Fold out solar panels

Articles.Content: I cant find the mod, but i see it on alot of videos, could someone link it?
alot of mods have fold out solar panels. the MMI satellite pack has some good ones though.
Kosmos and Bace are two mods I can think of right now that would fit that description. Try them!

I'd recommend Kosmos and MMI.S. MMI.S has some really nice small accordion-style panels that provide enough power to keep the pretty satellites that come with it humming along smoothly. Kosmos' solar panels are freaking huge; great for large ships/structures. I'm thinking of slapping some on to a DSM explorer vessel and using them as a power source.

However, if you install the Kosmos parts pack (any of them), be sure to remove the PowerTech and MuTech plugins from the archives before installing, or you're liable to overwrite your more recent versions. That will result in a "part not available in this version of KSP" error for any part using PowerTech, and will revert MechJeb back to a previous version (I think the Kosmos SSPP is packed with v1.9.0 of MuMech; it's on 1.9.2 with a 1.9.3 beta).
